strategy.name: set-keep
strategy.description:
Sets the 'keep' level.
E.g. <set-keep>4 sets the keep level to 4.

strategy.name: get-keep
strategy.description: Give the current 'keep' level. Default is 0.

strategy.name: pass-keep
strategy.description:
Builds command-line parameter for 'keep' levels for calling XT tools.
E.g. xtc-transform(!"abox2text", pass-keep ) passes the 'keep' level to abox2text.
